author: luehe
msg: * Variables appear as page-scoped attributes local to the tag file,
and are synchronized with the calling page context at various points.
* Fragment invocations can no longer be parameterized.

author: costin
msg: This allows the container to deal with flushing the buffer (
wich is done automatically if the servlet doesn't explicitely
flush()/close() ). The container can attach the Content-Length
header which is usefull in many cases.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
